name: Lexter.ai
headline: LLM for Legal in Brazil
description: Lexter is the first legal LLM company in Brazil, already working with 3 out of the top 5 law firms in the Country

founders.name: Pedro Jahara, Founder
founders.description:
I'm a Co-founder and CEO of Lexter.ai. 
Prior to Lexter I've founded BelugaDB (a self-service BI tool for big data) and R2U.io (platform that improves e-commerce conversion rates via AR). I was also the CEO of Revmob and a consultant at Bain&Co.
I love music, japanese culture (anime, food, ...), crossfit and snowboarding

founders.name: Pedro Calderon, Founder
founders.description:
I've studied naval engineering at USP, in Brazil, in my graduation year I discovered that I liked programming much more than I liked boats! Shortly after as a developer at RevMob I discovered a new passion, creating products.

In 2016 I created my first startup eDoc, a health tech with the mission to optimize inefficiencies in the Brazilian health care market, focusing in patients primary care.

Finally in 2020 I joined the Lexter.ai founding team to try to change the Brazilian lawtech scene.

generated_description:
**Lexter.ai: Revolutionizing Legal Services with AI**

Founded in 2020 and based in São Paulo, Brazil, Lexter.ai is breaking ground as the first legal-focused Large Language Model (LLM) company in the country. As part of the prestigious Y Combinator Batch W22, Lexter is already making waves by collaborating with three of Brazil's top five law firms, showing that it's not just a promising startup but a transformative player in the legal tech space.

Their mission? To automate and optimize legal processes through innovative artificial intelligence solutions, allowing lawyers to focus on winning cases rather than getting bogged down by tedious tasks. With a capable team of 18 employees, Lexter is harnessing machine learning and AI to create virtual assistants that streamline the legal workflow, from lead qualification to customer relationship management, document preparation, and process tracking.

The Lexter platform offers a comprehensive suite of functionalities aimed at enhancing law firm efficiency. Notable features include 24/7 customer service via WhatsApp, automated document generation, and intelligent lead triage. These specialists—Lia for customer relations and Laura for legal processes—ensure that firms can maintain high productivity levels without sacrificing the quality of service.

For those considering how to elevate their legal practice, Lexter provides tiered plans tailored to different needs, starting at R$199/month for essential services. Their technology not only adheres to strict data protection regulations but also guarantees superior efficiency, enabling over a thousand law offices to automate their operations successfully.

Lexter.ai isn't just another tech startup; it's an essential partner for legal professionals looking to thrive in a rapidly evolving marketplace. By prioritizing strategic thinking and quality results, Lexter is setting new standards for what’s possible in legal services.

For more information, you can visit their website at [Lexter.ai](https://www.lexter.ai).
